name: Geo Scanner
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The Geo Scanner provides information about blocks around and chunk where scanner located. Geo scanner has delay between scans, so you should be ready for this.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/geo_scanner/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your Geo Scanner to a computer to make use of it!
